description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission dated 06/08/2018(Ref: 18/0537/HD) for the excavation of lower ground floor & garden to facilitate the construction of single storey wrap around extension to rear of lower ground floor & a 2 storey side extension to ground and 1st floors. Replacement of existing roof lantern. Variation of Condition 1 to allow:- To increase the depth of the rear extension by 400mm. Roof lantern would also be widened by 400mm to keep roof light opening symmetrical with the enlarged extension. The patio size and depth remains the same as previously approved, though will project an additional 400mm into the rear garden and patio stairs are being widened by 2.0m. - To relocate the stairs at the side walk to the rear wall of the rear extension.- To replace the existing two high level windows of lower ground floor utility and bathroom on the side elevation with a new high level frosted window.- Replace the previous approved side window of the toilet on lower ground level with 600 x 1250mm high level window glazed with double or triple toughened glass. - To install a roof light on the approved side extension that would not exceed 150mm above roof level. - To widen the patio door by 237.5mm
